oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The sorcerer !nuin|kúïten. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.-15. 5079-5101, 5104-5109).
A song that Dia!kwain's father Xaa-ttin used to sing: when he used to sleep he would hear a person calling him (the sorcerer !nuin-|kui-ten).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What Xaa
ttin used to sing (the broken string)
